main event: A observer reported seeing a yellow light traveling at high speed over Dallastown, Pennsylvania, and another witness noted a huge, silvery, egg-shaped UFO.
interesting points: The yellow light was observed for approximately 30 seconds,The observer described the yellow light as traveling at the speed of a jet,The letter mentioned the observer's fascination with UFOs, with over 2700 recorded sightings,The egg-shaped UFO was reported to be traveling northwest at the speed of a jet,The records are part of the official Air Force documentation on UFOs.
sighted object: yellow light and a huge, silvery, egg-shaped UFO
witness description: one observer of a yellow light and one observer of an egg-shaped UFO
